title: John Keefe's Data Library
description: Using Datasette to store and share my data

Police_Use_of_Force.description: Minneapolis Police use of force data, downloaded June 17, 2020

Police_Stop_Data.description: Minneapolis Police stop data, downloaded June 17, 2020

population_2010blocks_2020nabes.source: US Census & Minnesota Open Data Portal
population_2010blocks_2020nabes.description_html: 2010 Minneapolis population by blocks, linked to their neighborhood. For details and ideas for queries, see this blog post, and for the column descriptions see this one for Washington, DC (they're the same).

nyc_2010censusblocks_2020policeprecincts.source: US Census & NYC Open Data Portal, combined by John Keefe
nyc_2010censusblocks_2020policeprecincts.description_html: 2010 NYC population by US Census blocks, with each block linked to the police precinct in which it sits. For details and column descriptions see this blog post.

nyc_2010pop_2020precincts.source: US Census & NYC Open Data Portal, combined by John Keefe
nyc_2010pop_2020precincts.description_html: 2010 NYC population by NYC police precinct, as they were drawn in 2020. For details and column descriptions see this blog post.

precinct_block_key.source: US Census & NYC Open Data Portal, combined by John Keefe
precinct_block_key.description_html: Just a list of US Census block numbers and the precincts in which they sit. Join this to US Census tables to get aggregates by precinct, as those precincts existed in 2020. For details see this blog post.

dc_2010blocks_2020policedistricts_popula.source: US Census & DC Open Data Portal, combined by John Keefe
dc_2010blocks_2020policedistricts_popula.description_html: 2010 DC population by US Census block, with each block linked to the police district and public service area in which it sits. For details and column descriptions see this blog post.

dc_2010pop_by_2020police_districts.source: US Census & DC Open Data Portal, combined by John Keefe
dc_2010pop_by_2020police_districts.description_html: 2010 DC population by DC police district. For details and column descriptions see this blog post.

chicago_2010blocks_2020policedistricts_p.source: US Census & Chicago Open Data Portal, combined by John Keefe
chicago_2010blocks_2020policedistricts_p.description_html: 2010 population by US Census block, with each block linked to the police district area in which it sits, as those districts were drawn in 2020. For details and column descriptions see this blog post.

chicago_2010pop_by_2020policedistricts.source: US Census & Chicago Open Data Portal, combined by John Keefe
chicago_2010pop_by_2020policedistricts.description_html: 2010 Chicago population by police district, as those districts were drawn in 2020. For details and column descriptions see this blog post.

chicago_2010blocks_2020policedistricts_k.source: US Census & Chicago Open Data Portal, combined by John Keefe
chicago_2010blocks_2020policedistricts_k.description_html: Just a list of US Census block numbers and the police districts in which they sit. Join this to US Census tables to get aggregates by precinct, as those precincts existed in 2020. For details see this blog post.
